attributes.action: Please prohibit email votes in the referendum in case of fraud
attributes.background:
Electronic voting can be tampered with to skew votes, please refer to the link
http://www.globalresearch.ca/electronic-voting-fraud-a-real-threat-to-any-democrat-running-for-president/5459534

rejection.details: Voting by e-mail is not an option in the UK. We are not aware of any proposal that people should be able to vote by e-mail in any future referendum.
